Uses of Interface
org.apache.metamodel.convert.TypeConverter

Packages that use TypeConverter
org.apache.metamodel Root package for MetaModel 
org.apache.metamodel.convert DataContext decorator for implicit conversion of value types after querying and before insertion. 
 

Uses of TypeConverter in org.apache.metamodel
 

Methods in org.apache.metamodel with parameters of type TypeConverter
 void QueryPostprocessDataContext.addConverter(Column column, TypeConverter<?,?> converter)
          Adds a TypeConverter to this DataContext's query engine (Query Postprocessor) for read operations.
 

Uses of TypeConverter in org.apache.metamodel.convert
 

Classes in org.apache.metamodel.convert that implement TypeConverter
 class StringToBooleanConverter
          A TypeConverter that converts String values (on the physical layer) to interpreted Booleans.
 class StringToDateConverter
          A TypeConverter that converts String values (on the physical layer) to interpreted Dates.
 class StringToDoubleConverter
          A TypeConverter that converts String values (on the physical layer) to interpreted Doubles.
 class StringToIntegerConverter
          A TypeConverter that converts String values (on the physical layer) to interpreted Integers.
